title: The Tobacco problem: what do you think?
creator_credit: Kent Smith, Stanley Croner and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Points out the dangers of smoking by presenting interviews and demonstrations by laboratory scientists and doctors. Emphasises the reasons why people smoke, and includes debate by teenagers on the pros and cons of smoking.
